terracraft.advancements.chest_slayer.des: Send a Possessed Coffer to Davy Jones' locker
item.terracraft.shock_pendant: Jewel o' Flash o' the Skies
item.terracraft.snorkel.tooltip: Allows ye to breathe when overboard
item.terracraft.plastic_drinking_hat.too: Allows ye to drink yer grog faster
item.terracraft.novelty_drinking_hat.too: 'Hey! I'm #1, and I let gravity do my drinking!'
item.terracraft.night_vision_goggles.too: Allows ye to see in the dark
item.terracraft.panic_necklace.tooltip: Increases yer Landlubbin' speed after takin' damage
item.terracraft.shock_pendant.tooltip: Has a chance to strike attackers with th' Flash o' the Skies
item.terracraft.flame_pendant.tooltip: Has a chance to set attackers aflame
item.terracraft.thorn_pendant.tooltip: Has a chance to damage attackers
item.terracraft.obsidian_skull.tooltip: Gives you Flame's Bane for a short while when ye are hurt by embers
item.terracraft.umbrella.tooltip: Can be wielded as a targe or to soften yer fall
item.terracraft.fire_gauntlet.tooltip: Makes yer attacks cause flame damage
item.terracraft.pocket_piston.tooltip: Increases blowback dealt by yer attacks
item.terracraft.cross_necklace.tooltip: Increases th' length of invincibility when ye take damage
item.terracraft.antidote_vessel.tooltip: Greatly decreases th' time of any foul brews
item.terracraft.lucky_scarf.tooltip: Gives ye more treasure from blocks ye dig
item.terracraft.superstitious_hat.toolti: Gives ye more plunder from creatures ye send to Davy Jones' locker
item.terracraft.digging_claws.tooltip: Increases yer digging speed and base digging level
item.terracraft.steadfast_spikes.tooltip: Helps ye keep yer footing during stormy seas
item.terracraft.running_shoes.tooltip: Increases yer landlubbin' speed and makes ye step higher when wobblin' at speed
item.terracraft.bunny_hoppers.tooltip: Allows ye to leap and fall like a rabbit
item.terracraft.crystal_heart.tooltip: Increases the sturdiness of yer hull
item.terracraft.villager_hat.tooltip: Increases yer bartering skills with Landlubbers
item.terracraft.cloud_in_a_bottle.toolti: Allows ye to leap while in the air
item.terracraft.vampiric_glove.tooltip: Allows ye to absorb the life force of creatures ye punch
item.terracraft.helium_flamingo.tooltip:
Allows ye to swim in th' skies for as long as ye can hold yer breath
Press %s while in th' skies to start swimmin'
item.terracraft.golden_hook.tooltip: Gives ye more balls o' wisdom from creatures ye send to Davy Jones' Locker
item.terracraft.aqua_dashers.tooltip: Allows ye to walk over the seas
item.terracraft.charm_of_sinking.tooltip: Allows ye to walk under the seas
